description:
Kaneamari is panicked and desperate for Kan and Akubi’s help after ruining his dad’s golf club. Enter cult anime figure Moonlight Phantom Thief. With a little imagination and magic, all seems solved, until a certain self-described detective shows up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Goutei Settou Jiken: Kaiketsu Hen! no Hanashi
Robbery at the Mansion. Solving the Case!
大豪邸窃盗事件 解決編! の話
